slide.title: Things that might trip you up
slide.blurb: ✔ default charset is UTF-8 instead of ISO-8859-1
slide.example: <?php echo htmlspecialchars("abc".chr(0xE0)."def"); // 5.3 "abc�def" echo htmlspecialchars("abc".chr(0xE0)."def", NULL, 'UTF-8'); // 5.3 "" echo htmlspecialchars("abc".chr(0xE0)."def"); // 5.4 "" echo htmlspecialchars("abc".chr(0xE0)."def", ENT_IGNORE); // 5.4 "abcdef"

<?php
echo [1,2,3];
// Notice: Array to string conversion in test.php code on line 1

array_diff([1,2,3], [1,2, [3] ]);
// Notice: Array to string conversion in test.php on line 2
slide.blurb: ✔ extending an abstract constructor must match the signature
slide.example:
<?php
  abstract class Base {
    abstract public function __construct();
  }
  class Foo extends Base {
    public function __construct($bar) {}
// FATAL  Declaration of Foo::__construct() must be compatible with Base::__construct()
  }
slide.blurb: ✔ stream_select() preserves keys of passed array
✔ XSLT writes are disabled by default
✔ mcrypt_generic_end() removed in favour of mcrypt_generic_deinit()
✔ PDO needs at least mysql client lib 4.1 now
✔ Datetime ignores TZ env var and falls back to UTC if none set
✔ Tiger hash output fixed - See bug 61307
